page.title: 20Work in the Lawshall Area
page.content: In our area,apart from farms,pubs,shops and schools,there are some small busin- esses employing a few local people.A wood yard,selling fire logs from trees felled locally,a wood carver,a local handyman/gardener,a car repair workshop a small business restoring vintage cars There are 4 separate builders and a few clerical workers with offices at home.Several villagers grow vegetables and sell at their garden gate,it is quite common to see a table laden with fresh garden produce,to serve yourself and leave the money in a tin. The re- mainder of the working population travel out of the area for employment using their own transport or the works bus service. The facts and information within have been painstakingly prepared by a small group of Parents, Friends and Children of Lawshall Primary School, Suffolk.
